function.name: ask_user
function.description:
Prompts the user for input and returns their response.

This function displays the provided `input_prompt` and waits for the user to enter a message.
The user's input is then returned as a string.

Returns:
    The user's input message.

input_prompt.description: The prompt to display to the user, instructing them on what information to provide.
input_prompt.title: Input Prompt
